key: Hey, I kinda told ya to fuck off.
en: Hey, I kinda told ya to fuck off.
pt: Hey, eu meio que te disse para ires para o caralho.

key: However long it takes your ass to get a verdict, bitch.
en: However long it takes your ass to get a verdict, bitch.
pt: O quanto esse teu cu demora a arranjar um veredito, cabrão.

key: Tell me, how long do you take to comb your hair in the morning?
en: Tell me, how long do you take to comb your hair in the morning?
pt: Diz-me, quanto tempo é que levas a pentar-te de manhã?

key: Unless ya really lookin' to get ya teeth broken.
en: Unless ya really lookin' to get ya teeth broken.
pt: A não ser que queiras mesmo ficar sem dentes.
